channel.title: Homes on Abhishek Verma
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Abhishek Verma

item.description: Biography I am a Software Engineer at VISA at the Bangalore Office since July 2018 where I have been working with the CyberSource Payments team. My responsibilities include designing, implementing and maintaining large scale distributed systems used in everyday payment transactions. I graduated from the department of Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Kanpur in June 2018. During my time as an undergraduate, I worked on various projects in the fields of Distributed Systems and Databases, Cyber Security, Computer Systems and Machine Learning.
